oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, from 25 to 30 lines per page, in black ink.
According to the colophon (f. 213r), copy completed in the last days of Shawwāl 657 AH [September 1259 AD] in the hand of Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Kamāl al-Badīʻī al-Bukhārī in Bukhara.
MS Arab 265. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
